name: Vikids 2017
description:
Graduation Video Game
School : ISART DIGITAL MONTREAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

Choose your teammate carefully because in the world of Vikids cooperation is paramount to defeat the titan that faces you. But beware because a link connects you to your partner and everything that crosses it affects you!

Number of players : 2
Platform : PC
Engine : Unity 3D
Genre : Cooperative boss fight

Producer : Zacharie TOURNON-MARTIN
Level Design : Maxime CARLES, Titouan RUMEUR
Game Design : Melcom BRIY, Vincent FERRETTI-RIVET
Game Programming: Mathieu AUBIN-PELLETIER,
Game Design & Programming : Matthieu MENIER
Game Artist :Vincent BOICHON, Claire GERBER
